_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: OpenMP (Windows)
author: martinyy09@gmail.com
description: Running OpenMP Windows binaries via Wine for full plugin compatibility.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt -y update
apt -y install curl git jq unzip

## Ganti MATCH ke versi Windows x86
MATCH=win-x86.zip

LATEST_JSON=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com")
RELEASES=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com")

if [ -z "${VERSION}" ] || [ "${VERSION}" == "latest" ]; then
    DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${LATEST_JSON} | jq -r '.assets[] | select(.name | contains("'$MATCH'")) | .browser_download_url')
else
    DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${RELEASES} | jq -r --arg VERSION "${VERSION}" '.[] | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .assets[] | select(.name | contains("'$MATCH'")) | .browser_download_url')
fi

echo "Downloading: ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
curl -sSL -o openmp.zip ${DOWNLOAD_URL}

mkdir -p /mnt/server
unzip -o openmp.zip -d /mnt/server/
rm openmp.zip

cd /mnt/server || exit

if [ ! -f config.json ]; then
    echo "Creating default config.json..."
    echo '{"pawn": {"main_scripts": ["gamemode 1"]}, "network": {"port": 7777}, "rcon": {"password": "changeme"}}' > config.json
fi

echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed..."
echo "-----------------------------------------"

variables.name: Version
variables.description: The version you want to install (tag name from GitHub)
